application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
Moreland Mews Estate

1 Silver Birch - Reduce crown to previous pruning points. Clear roof of adjacent private property (actionable nuisance).
2 Silver Birch - Reduce lateral crown spread to form narrower crown. Reduce up to 2.5m to clear adjacent properties (actionable nuisance). Lift crown to 4m.
4 Weeping Silver Birch - Lift crown all round to 3.5m to clear footway & buildings.
5 Weeping Silver Birch - Lift crown all round to 3.5m to clear footway & buildings. Remove deadwood
7 Norway Maple - Reduce lateral crown spread by 1m & lift to 3.5m to clear parking area. 
10 London Plane - Reduce to previous pruning points on building side (max 3m branch length) then lift & reduce lateral crown spread to balance shape (max 4m branch length).
12 Pillar Apple - Remove 1 x lowest branch rubbing in crown. Reduce lateral crown spread by up to 2m to balance 
16 Wild Cherry - Remove deadwood. Re-inspect when in leaf to assess crown condition. 
19 Weeping Silver Birch - Lift crown all round to 3.5m to clear footway road & buildings.
22 Turkey Oak - Reduce crown to previous pruning points removing 2m branch length max.
23 Silver Birch - Light overall crown reduction max 1m branch length. Remove deadwood & Ivy growth from crown.
34 Rowan - Remove deadwood & lift crown to 3m over footway.
35 Common Lime - Lift crown to 5m and remove epicormic growth.
36 Common Lime - Remove deadwood.
37 Norway Maple - Remove deadwood 
40 Sycamore -Fell & poison.
41 Ash - Fell & poison. 
48 Weeping Silver Birch - Lift crown all round to 2.5m to clear road, footway & buildings. 
50 Holly - Lift crown to 2m all round & cut back to give 0.5m clearance from building.
51 Apple - Reduce crown to rear boundary (1m branch length).
